definition: lose clarity or turn aside especially from the main subject of attention or course of argument in writing, thinking, or speaking
details:
verb
- lose clarity or turn aside especially from the main subject of attention or course of argument in writing, thinking, or speaking
= example: lose clarity or turn aside especially from the main subject of attention or course of argument in writing, thinking, or speaking
= synonyms: stray
- wander from a direct or straight course
= synonyms: sidetrack
